buffs.description: [Tribe Fortification] is applied even when Elementalist is in Time Shop, and can be increased up to 250 for elf units.
buffs.name: Tribe Fortification (Elf and Human)

buffs.description: Increases nature resistance to 75 for each 5-star Elementalist, and 150 nature resistance for each 6-star Elementalist. Also increases max nature resistance through Elementalists from 2,000 to 4,000.
buffs.name: Nature Resistance

hidden_abilites: At its first appearance, it increases the attack speed and movement speed of all ally units, and casts a shield that temporarily grants immunity against magical attacks.
Increases attack power, attack range and critical strike rate of all units by 4%.
Increases nature resistance by 75 for each Elementalist, and 150 nature resistance for each Senior Elementalist. Also increases max nature resistance through Elementalists from 2,000 to 4,000.
[Tribe Fortification] is applied even when Elementalist is in Time Shop, and can be increased up to 250 for elf units.
description.skill2: Increase HP of Elf units in Outland Battle. (0%, 0%, 12%, 16%, 21%)
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Elementalist ]
